content: So often we avoid running water, and running water is a lot of fun. We don't make mistakes we just have happy little accidents. This is a fantastic little painting. Get away from those little Christmas tree things we used to make in school.

I thought today we would make a happy little stream that's just running through the woods here. We'll put a happy little bush here. We'll have a super time. We need a shadow side and a highlight side. With something so strong, a little bit can go a long way. Every single thing in the world has its own personality - and it is up to you to make friends with the little rascals.
